title: Does anyone know how to get korean voice overs for champs and announcer?
body: Wondering if there are any 3rd party software that Riot would allow or is there something i can do in the client myself? Thanks

replies.body: Damn koreaboos are worse than weeaboos.
FYI not even korean, the voices just sound better :P

> [{quoted}](name=Xuízunä,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=trAKAZz3,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-14T20:12:26.003+0000)
>
> FYI not even korean, the voices just sound better :P

Trolling aside, there used to be LVOC, but Riot changed the assets so you can no longer do it. I liked to use Korean when I was learning it. it was super useful. Same issue without being able to type in most Asian languages.

Riot hate compatibility and ease of use. So, you're out of luck.
yeah just change server to Korean server
Tried that last year but it feels like they blocked it? Unless i am doing it wrong? Whats the steps?
